title: Displayed Alert
description: Tracks details & responses of alerts presented to visitors.

xdm:displayedAlertImpression.title: Displayed Alert Impressions
xdm:displayedAlertImpression.description: Count of the total number of times an alert has been displayed.

xdm:displayedAlertClickThrough.title: Displayed Alert Click Through
xdm:displayedAlertClickThrough.description: Tracks when a visitor clicks through on an alert message presented to them.

xdm:displayedAlertID.title: Displayed Alert ID

xdm:displayedAlertDismissal.title: Displayed Alert Dismissal
